topics.body: Jesus fucking christ; so yeah that thing I was talking about how psychology plays a massive part into video games or even anything plays a massive effect.  Basically psychology can play up to a 15% effect on whether or not someone wins a video game match or sports event or whatever based solely upon the psychology of the person participating regardless of the person's skill level or such.
